answers.text:
In a March 2010 AFI Webinar on social media, different cities said challenges included:

Needing a policy that aligned with the organizations values and cultures
Flexibility
Educating staff
Legal issues
Accountability
Moving from one central point of contact to other departments maintaining sites
Branding

For the complete presentation go to http://transformgov.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/document/105866/policy_and_risk_management_of_social_media_presentation
I hope this helps.
